content:
/>
XI.ii.3.A.3.a
.
Elections Not Acted Upon at Time of Death
Treat an election by the deceased beneficiary not acted on at the time of death as though the decedent was still living.
Note
:  Pay any increase as accrued under
38 U.S.C. 5121
.
Reference
:  For more information on elections, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 1.A
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A  - Entitlement to Accrued Benefits Under 38 U.S.C. 5121
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
